mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.user_name, u.email, u.mobile, u.password, u.status, u.create_time, u.sex, u.dept_id deptId, u.last_login_time, u.update_time, u.remark, u.image, d.dept_name, GROUP_CONCAT(r.id) AS roleIds, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_name) AS roleNames FROM young_user u LEFT JOIN young_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.id) LEFT JOIN young_user_role ur ON (u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN young_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName} group by u.user_name,u.id,u.email,u.mobile,u.password, u.status,u.create_time,u.sex,u.dept_id ,u.last_login_time,u.update_time,u.remark,u.image
